title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: A legendary 35mm film camera renowned for its precision engineering, iconic design, and exceptional image quality.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: A classic rock icon, the 1965 Gibson SG Standard delivers powerful tone and sleek, lightweight design favored by legendary guitarists.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: The Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984) is a groundbreaking personal computer that introduced a user-friendly graphical interface and compact design.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: The Rolex Submariner 16610 is a legendary dive watch known for its robust design, precision, and timeless appeal.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A rare first edition of Fitzgerald’s classic novel, prized for its literary and historical significance.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: An iconic piece of mid-century design, the Eames Lounge Chair blends luxury, comfort, and timeless style.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: A rare and provocative artwork, the Banksy original screen print showcases the artist’s signature blend of satire and street art.
